由.definition: to follow; from; because of; due to; by; via; through; (before a noun and a verb) it is for ... to ...

由不得.definition: cannot help; to be beyond control of

由儉入奢易，由奢入儉難.pinyin: you2 jian3 ru4 she1 yi4 , you2 she1 ru4 jian3 nan2
由儉入奢易，由奢入儉難.definition: (idiom) it is easy to go from frugality to extravagance; the reverse is not so easy

由憐生愛.definition: to develop love for sb out of pity for them

由於.definition: due to; as a result of; thanks to; owing to; since; because

由此可見.definition: from this, it can be seen that...

由盛轉衰.definition: from prosperity to decline; at its peak before the decline

由著.definition: let (one) have his way; as (one) pleases; at (one's) will

由表及裡.definition: to proceed from the outside to the inside; to see the essence merely by looking at the superficial appearance
